name: Stranded (itch) (gamerdev)
description:
A zombie horror fps survival shooter.

You are stranded on a zombie infested island. The only way to get out of this nightmare is to find and kill the Parasitic zombie monster which is  spreading the virus that is infecting the residents of this island.

Controls
  • WASD - Move
  •  Hold Shift while moving - Run
  • Space - Jump
  • LMB - Light Attack
  • RMB - Heavy Attack
  • O - Options Menu
  • M - Objectives
  • N - Nightvision
  • F - Flashlight
  • E - Interact
  • I - Inventory
  • Mouse Scroll - Weapon Change

Controls can be changed from Options Menu/Controls.
